author: Paul J. Davies
title: Why Private Equity Risks Tripping on Its Own Success
text:
The world of investing is going privateâ€”but long-term returns are under threat.
The past decade has seen a flood of capital into hard-to-see, less liquid assets, transforming the scale and scope of the private-equity firms managing this money.
The biggest firms see this as adding to their advantages in an increasingly competitive world. But...
